parameter.value: My job is to kill persons like you.
I can offer you a tip, and that's all. See those bridges to the south? Jump.
We are on an eternal quest for secrets.
I don't want to be involved in no mission.
I know so many secrets my head will soon explode.
I heard some settlers moved in upstairs.
Archdemos are phenomenal creatures, but they tend to kill anyone who they dislike. It's just a matter of time before they find me doing something they disapprove to.
Liches are the servants of the darker powers. Especially archdemons seems to have understood this and so did the liches become their servants.
Hell is no place anyone wants to visit. I know only one human who actually have been there, and that's Banegear.
The Godslayer was forged by the archdemons, and as far as I know it's again in their possession.

The Godslayer as we call it down here, has been forged by the archdemons. However, it thereafter disappeared thought to never reappear. But aeons later it did, and again, it's in the possession of the archdemons.
He, exactly as the archdemons, has left the religion of Zathroth and proceeded higher. His past is dark, my friend. I don't know if anyone but himself can give a full account of it, though.
Dark magic is something which tears your soul apart. Eventually, your tarnished soul will be on the brink of dissolving. The last fragment of soul is kept alive by the evil inside you.
Archdemons believes that they are higher than the gods, thus they abandon any other religion than the one they alone create.
I believe in the archdemons. Not in any god.
He is a follower of Zathroth, and I believe if he ever happen to come here he'd be killed by the archdemons.
